content: short row turns row 1 rs sl1wyib k16 ssk k1 turn your work row 2 ws sl1wyif p5 p2tog p1 turn your work row 3 rs sl1wyib knit until one stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn your work row 4 ws sl1wyif purl until one stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn your work 4 january socks by allison rose repeat row 3&4 until all stitches have been worked - 4 more times 5 times total there are now 18 stitches for the heel heel gusset we will now pick up stitches along the sides of the heel flap and work decreases to shape the heel gusset set-up sl1wyib knit the rest of the heel stitches pick up 15 stitches along the side of the heel flap pick up your stitches in the space before each purl bump in the garter edge pick up one stitch in the transition between the heel flap and the instep stitches after the last purl bump this is now the bor pm or have this be a break in your magic loop knitting round 1 knit across the 30 instep stitches pm for side of foot or have this be a break in your magic loop knitting pick up one stitch in the transition between the instep and the heel flap before the first purl bump then pick up 15 stitches along the heel flap pick up your stitches in the space after each purl bump in the garter edge you now have 80 stitches on your needles - 30 stitches on needle one for the instep and 50 stitches on needle two if you have your magic loop breaks at the sides of the foot knit across the 18 heel turn stitches you are now at the stitches you pick up along the heel flap - ktbl until there are two stitches left k2tog round 2 knit across the 30 instep stitches slm ssk knit 14 tbl knit to the end of the round round 3 knit until there are two stitches left before bor k2tog round 4 knit across the 30 instep stitches slm ssk knit until the end of the round repeat rounds 3&4 until your stitch count is back down to 60sts foot continue knitting in the round without any decreases until the foot is 1 5 shorter than your desired length the sample was knit until it measured ~7 from the start of the heel turn toe the socks are finished with a wedge toe round 1 k1 ssk knit until three stitches from the side of the foot k2tog k1 slm k1 ssk knit until three stitches from bor k2tog k1 round 2 knit all 5 january socks by allison rose repeat row 1 & 2 until there are 24 stitches left on your needles 12 on each needle ending on a round 1 kitchener bind-off the remaining stitches video tutorial for the kitchener bind-off finishing work pattern twice for the left and right sock weave in
